response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional and worth every penny. Given its high value and quality, I believe it's only fair that we discuss a price that reflects its true worth. Considering its significance to both of us, I propose a special introductory price of $95 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored for someone as discerning as you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product.", "product_price": 95}
